attributes.action: make a change to the law regarding the position of front indicators on cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make a change to the law regarding the position of front indicators on cars, reason being that indicators have moved to the inside of the head lights on most cars now and with the changes in construction of most headlights making them brighter makes it more difficult to actualy see the turn signal making it hazardous to other road users
